item.title: Take Five：谁是始作俑者？
item.description: 美国政府停摆又持续了一周，财报季正在如火如荼地进行，中美贸易关系紧张，还有大量数据值得仔细斟酌。【原文：The U.S. government shutdown extends into another week, earnings season is in full swing, U.S./China trade tensions are tense and there's plenty of data to mull over.】

item.title: 关税过山车促使中国出口商 "放弃 "美国
item.description: 在美国反复无常的关税声明所造成的混乱中，生产从厨房用具到万圣节装饰品等各种产品的中国出口商做出了回应，向欧洲、拉丁美洲、中东和非洲的买家出售了更多商品。【原文：Amid the chaos of erratic U.S. tariff announcements, Chinese exporters making everything from kitchen appliances to Halloween decorations have responded by selling more goods to buyers in Europe, Latin America, the Middle East and Africa.】

item.title: 爱马仕设计师 Veronique Nichanian 在 37 年后离职
item.description: 爱马仕周五证实，爱马仕男装艺术总监 Veronique Nichanian 在品牌工作 37 年后即将离职。【原文：Veronique Nichanian, artistic director of menswear styles at Hermes , is departing after 37 years at the brand, Hermes confirmed on Friday.】

item.title: 捷克、波兰企业抢购德国中型企业的廉价产品
item.description: 德国经济蹒跚起步，破产浪潮愈演愈烈，这促使捷克和波兰企业越境收购陷入困境的公司，以推动向欧洲最大市场及其他地区的扩张。【原文：A growing wave of bankruptcies in Germany's stuttering economy is spurring Czech and Polish businesses to snap up struggling companies across the border to fuel expansion into Europe's largest market and beyond.】

item.title: 英国葡萄酒酿造商希望促进出口，迎接最温暖的夏季
item.description: 在国内销售增长放缓之后，英国的葡萄酒生产商们打赌，出口量的激增能够维持他们曾经的新产品，并希望今年英国有记录以来最温暖的夏天能够为他们带来动力，因为气候变化优化了酿酒条件。【原文：English winemakers are betting that surging exports can sustain their once novelty product after domestic sales growth slowed, hoping for a boost from Britain's warmest summer on record this year as climate change optimised conditions.】

item.title: 图片报》报道：保时捷监事会就首席执行官布卢姆的继任者达成一致意见
item.description: 据《图片报》周五援引六位不愿透露姓名的消息人士的话报道，保时捷监事会已就首席执行官奥利弗-布卢姆的继任者人选达成一致。【原文：Porsche's supervisory board has agreed on a successor for CEO Oliver Blume, Bild reported on Friday, citing six unnamed sources.】

item.title: 尽管中美关系再度紧张，中国仍将保持基准贷款利率稳定
item.description: 路透社的一项调查显示，尽管北京与华盛顿之间的贸易紧张局势最近有所加剧，但中国决策者仍将保持谨慎，因此预计中国将在周一连续第五个月保持基准贷款利率稳定。【原文：China is expected to keep benchmark lending rates steady for the fifth consecutive month in October on Monday, a Reuters survey showed, as policymakers remain cautious despite a recent flare-up in trade tensions between Beijing and Washington.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，美光将在禁令后退出中国服务器芯片业务
item.description: 美光公司计划停止向中国数据中心供应服务器芯片，因为该公司未能从中国政府 2023 年禁止其产品用于中国关键基础设施的禁令中恢复过来。【原文：Micron plans to stop supplying server chips to data centres in China after the business failed to recover from a 2023 government ban on its products in critical Chinese infrastructure, two people briefed on the decision said.】

item.title: 在中国，本土品牌抢尽风头，全球企业举步维艰
item.description: 脆弱的经济和低迷的消费需求迫使企业高管重新思考品牌战略，并与不断崛起的本土竞争对手展开竞争。【原文：A fragile economy and sluggish consumer demand are forcing executives to rethink their brand strategy and compete with rising home-grown rivals.】

item.title: 在美洲需求疲软的情况下，卡车制造商沃尔沃实现营业利润预期
item.description: 瑞典卡车制造商沃尔沃周五公布的第三季度运营利润符合市场预期，尽管北美和南美需求疲软对业绩造成了影响。【原文：Swedish truckmaker Volvo reported a third-quarter operating profit in line with market expectations on Friday, even as weaker demand in North and South America weighed on the results.】

item.title: 美国信贷忧虑令投资者惶恐不安，亚洲金融股下滑
item.description: 周五，亚洲金融股下跌，其中日本的跌幅最大，此前美国地区银行股因担心风险和信贷质量不断上升而大幅下挫。【原文：Asian financial stocks dropped on Friday, with the worst declines in Japan, following a rout in U.S. regional banking shares on worries about mounting risks and credit quality.】

item.title: 消息人士称，数据中心运营商 DayOne 计划融资超过 10 亿美元
item.description: 据四位知情人士透露，中国最大的数据中心运营商之一--GDS Holdings 旗下的全球数据中心运营商 DayOne 正在寻求在新一轮融资中筹集超过 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：DayOne, a global data centre operator affiliated with GDS Holdings , one of China's largest data centre operators, is seeking to raise more than $1 billion in a new funding round, four people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 早间竞标：为泡沫增添信用风险，退一步海阔天空
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 人工智能热潮波及英镑和瑞典王冠
item.description: 欧洲各国的货币市场首次开始感受到人工智能投资的热潮，分析师认为瑞典王冠和英镑将从中获益最多。【原文：The boom in investment in artificial intelligence is starting to be felt for the first time in currency markets across Europe, and analysts reckon the Swedish crown and sterling stand to benefit the most.】

item.title: 比亚迪因设计和电池问题最大规模召回超过11.5万辆汽车
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周五表示，由于存在设计缺陷和与电池相关的安全风险，中国汽车制造商比亚迪将对2015年至2022年间生产的11.5万多辆唐系列和元Pro汽车实施迄今为止最大规模的召回。【原文：Chinese car maker BYD will make its largest recall yet of more than 115,000 Tang series and Yuan Pro vehicles produced between 2015 and 2022 due to design defects and battery-related safety risks, China's market regulator said on Friday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市下跌，黄金再创新高，银行业恐慌加剧
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市追随华尔街走低，债券涨幅扩大，黄金创下新纪录，美国地区银行信贷压力的迹象令投资者惶恐不安。【原文：Asian shares tracked Wall Street lower, bonds extended gains and gold hit a fresh record on Friday, with signs of credit stress at U.S. regional banks putting investors on edge.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度炼油商从埃克森公司购买了第一批圭亚那石油
item.description: 贸易消息人士周五称，两家印度炼油商已从美国大型石油公司埃克森美孚购买了 400 万桶圭亚那原油，将于 2025 年底或 2026 年初交付，这是他们首次从南美生产国进口原油。【原文：Two Indian refiners have bought 4 million barrels of Guyanese crude oil from U.S. major Exxon Mobil to be delivered at end-2025 or in early 2026, in their first imports from the South American producer, trade sources said on Friday.】

item.title: 柴油机品牌所有者 OTB看好中国市场，不急于上市
item.description: OTB 集团创始人兼董事长伦佐-罗索（Renzo Rosso）表示，OTB 集团是意大利专业牛仔服装公司 Diesel 的母公司，也是包括 Maison Margiela 在内的奢侈品牌的所有者，该集团看好中国市场，并将加大对中国市场的投资。【原文：OTB Group, the parent of Italian denim specialist Diesel and owner of luxury brands including Maison Margiela, is positive on the Chinese market and is investing more in it, founder and chairman Renzo Rosso said.】

item.title: 由于贸易和停摆问题的影响，美元将出现周度下滑
item.description: 由于全球贸易摩擦和美国经济疲软的迹象支持了美联储进一步降息的理由，美元在上周五继续走低。【原文：The dollar remained on the back foot on Friday as global trade frictions and signs of weakness in the U.S. economy supported the case for more rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 特朗普与普京峰会在即，石油将出现周度下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京同意在匈牙利会晤讨论结束乌克兰战争之后，全球能源供应存在不确定性，油价在周五早盘走低，并将出现一周以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Oil prices edged lower in early trade on Friday, heading for a weekly loss, with uncertainty over global energy supplies after U.S. President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin agreed to meet in Hungary to discuss ending the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 汽车制造商集团警告称，Nexperia 芯片供应问题可能迅速中断美国生产
item.description: 代表主要汽车制造商的一个组织周四晚些时候警告说，中国与荷兰政府之间的争端引发的芯片中断可能会迅速影响美国的汽车生产。【原文：A group representing major automakers warned late on Thursday that a chip disruption stemming from a dispute between China and the Dutch government could quickly impact U.S. auto production.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利：经济放缓幅度可能没有我们想象的那么大
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联储主席尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周四表示，他认为劳动力市场大幅疲软或通胀飙升的可能性并不大，不过在这两者中，"劳动力市场出现负面意外的风险要大于通胀大幅上扬的风险"。【原文：Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari said Thursday he does not think that there is a big chance the labor market will weaken sharply or inflation will surge, though of the two, "there's more risk of a labor market negative surprise than a big uptick in inflation."】

item.title: 摩根大通和高盛预计美国每周申请失业救济人数下降
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan）和高盛（Goldman Sachs）的经济学家周四估计，上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量有所下降，但由于招聘乏力，许多人仍处于失业状态。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits fell last week, economists at JPMorgan and Goldman Sachs estimated on Thursday, but lackluster hiring has left many on unemployment rolls.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Meta 将为路易斯安那州数据中心场地达成近 300 亿美元的融资协议
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，Meta Platforms 公司将为其位于路易斯安那州农村地区的数据中心签署一份近 300 亿美元的融资方案，这将是有史以来最大的私人资本交易。【原文：Meta Platforms was set to seal an almost $30 billion finance package for its data center site in rural Louisiana, which would be the largest private capital deal on record, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 黑客利用加拿大和美国部分机场扩音系统赞扬哈马斯、批评特朗普
item.description: 据官员和新闻报道，黑客周二接管了四个机场的公共广播系统，其中三个在加拿大，一个在美国，播放赞扬哈马斯和批评唐纳德-特朗普总统的信息。【原文：Hackers took over the public address systems on Tuesday at four airports, three in Canada and one in the United States, to broadcast messages praising Hamas and criticizing President Donald Trump, according to officials and news reports.】

item.title: 特朗普称政府正在努力降低牛肉价格
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，他的政府正在努力降低牛肉的价格。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday that his administration was working to lower the price of beef in the country.】

item.title: 纽约批准为美光价值 1000 亿美元的半导体工厂铺设供电线路
item.description: 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）周四宣布，纽约州公共服务委员会批准了一条新的地下输电线路，将现有的克雷变电站与美光科技公司拟在奥农达加县建造的半导体巨型工厂连接起来。【原文：A new underground transmission line was approved by the New York State Public Service Commission linking an existing Clay substation with Micron Technology's proposed semiconductor megafab facility in Onondaga County, Governor Kathy Hochul announced on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普表示将降低 Ozempic 的价格
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四表示，诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）最畅销的减肥药价格将下调，有关价格变动的谈判将迅速展开。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Thursday that the price of Novo Nordisk's best-selling weight-loss drug would be lowered and that negotiations over price changes would be swift.】

item.title: 塞马福尔：银行正与美国财政部商谈向阿根廷贷款 200 亿美元事宜
item.description: 据 Semafor 周四援引知情人士的话报道，包括摩根大通、美国银行、高盛和花旗集团在内的银行正在与美国财政部商谈向阿根廷提供高达 200 亿美元的贷款。【原文：Bancos, entre ellos JPMorgan , Banco de América , Goldman Sachs y Citigroup están en conversaciones con el Tesoro de Estados Unidos para proporcionar hasta 20.000 millones de dólares en préstamos a Argentina, informó Semafor el jueves, citando a personas familiarizadas con el asunto.】

item.title: 美国联邦储蓄委员会提前三年撤销花旗银行歧视案
item.description: 美国最高消费者金融监督机构周四终止了一项针对花旗集团贷款部门花旗银行的 2023 年执法案件，该案件曾因该银行巨头涉嫌歧视加利福尼亚州的亚美尼亚裔美国人而对其进行处罚。【原文：The top U.S. consumer finance watchdog agency on Thursday terminated a 2023 enforcement case against Citigroup 's lending arm Citibank that had penalized the banking giant for alleged discrimination against Armenian Americans in California.】
